text: Ezɨ gumazamiziba kamaghɨram ami. Me gumazir dapaniba barazir puvatɨ. Me akɨrim ragha Ikiavɨra Itir God gasaragha mati tuavimɨn amizim tintinimɨn gumaziba bagha arui moghɨn, me aseba bagha bar ikuvigha men damazibar uan teviba apɨri. Me fo, men inazir afeziaba fomɨra Godɨn Akar Gavgavibar gɨn zui, ezɨ merara datɨrɨghɨn kamaghɨn amir puvatɨ. Me zuamɨra tuavir aghuir kam ataki.
